entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
